header_address: 367 Hillcrest Lane, Irvine, California, United States
payout_email_message: You have received a payout (commission)! Thanks for using our listing!
listing_welcome_email_content:
Hi {user_name}, Welcome to our website.
  • Username: {login}
  • Password: {password}
Thank you.
listing_published_email_content:
Hi {user_name},
We are pleased to inform you that your submission '{listing_name}' was just published on our website.

Thank you.
listing_new_email_subject: Thank you for adding a listing
listing_new_email_content:
Hi {user_name},
Thank you for submitting your listing '{listing_name}'.
listing_expired_email_content:
Hi {user_name},
We'd like you to inform you that your listing '{listing_name}' has expired and is no longer visible on our website. You can renew it in your account.

Thank you
listing_expiring_soon_email_subject: Your service is expiring in 5 days - {listing_name}
listing_expiring_soon_email_content:
Hi {user_name},
We'd like you to inform you that your service '{listing_name}' is expiring in 5 days.

Thank you
booking_user_waiting_approval_email_cont:
Hi {user_name},
Thank you for your booking request on {listing_name} for {dates}. Please wait for confirmation and further instructions.

Thank you
instant_booking_user_waiting_approval_em:
Hi {user_name},

Thank you
booking_owner_new_booking_email_subject: There is a new booking request for {listing_name}
booking_owner_new_booking_email_content:
Hi {user_name},
There's a new booking request on '{listing_name}' for {dates}. Go to your Bookings Dashboard to accept or reject it.

Thank you

Hi {user_name},

pay_booking_confirmation_email_subject: Your booking request was approved {listing_name}, please pay
pay_booking_confirmation_email_content:
Hi {user_name},
Your booking request on '{listing_name}' for {dates} was approved. Here's the payment link {payment_url}, the booking will expire after {expiration} if not paid!.

Thank you

paid_booking_confirmation_email_content:

Thank you
user_paid_booking_confirmation_email_con:
